text.div:
Network Type Codes

This value set includes a smattering of Network type codes.

Copyright Statement: This is an example set.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/benefit-network defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
in In NetworkServices rendered by a Network provider
out Out of NetworkServices rendered by a provider who is not in the Network

name: Network Type Codes
description: This value set includes a smattering of Network type codes.

concept.definition: Services rendered by a Network provider
Services rendered by a provider who is not in the Network
